description: System-generated unique identifier for a single one-time expense entry.
Person, vendor, or department associated with the charge; likely the payee or requester; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the vehicle or equipment to which this expense is attributed.
Accounting code used to post the expense to the appropriate ledger account.
Short text describing the expense item or purpose.
Recorded monetary amount of the expense, stored as a decimal value.
Additional free-form notes about the expense, such as category or justification.
System timestamp indicating when the record was last changed in the database.
Application-captured timestamp of the most recent user-initiated update; may mirror system timestamp; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was initially created by a user.
Identifier of the user account that last updated the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update performed by a user.
